General.Name: Midnight Holdings Group Inc
General.Description: Midnight Holdings Group, Inc. owns and operates automobile aftermarket products and service centers in the United States. The company sells automotive products and services through its own service center/retail outlets, as well as through franchisees to new and used automobiles. It primarily serves retail, commercial, and fleet customers. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Clinton Township, Michigan.
General.Address: 22600 Hall Road, Clinton Township, MI, United States, 48036

1.Name: Mr. Richard J. Kohl
1.Title: CFO, Principal Accounting Officer, Exec. VP of Fin. & Sec.
